TITLE: 'No one wants to be the state taxing student loan forgiveness.' Here's where borrowers may see a bill
SUMMARY: While student loan forgiveness is federally tax-free, borrowers may owe levies at the state level. Here's where you may see a bill.

TITLE: This 28-year-old is on track to save $1 million by her 30s: How she visited 7 countries in Europe—for just $2,800
SUMMARY: By spending frugally, saving her income and investing wisely, this 28-year-old financial blogger is on track to save $1 million and retire early in her 30s. Here's how her money strategy helped her take her dream vacation in Europe — for just $2,800.

TITLE: Bill Gates swears by this daily Wordle strategy—and it's not what the game recommends
SUMMARY: Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates is addicted to Wordle. Perhaps predictably, his daily strategy for the online word game is convoluted — and effective.

TITLE: Google Flights just busted a popular myth about saving money on flights
SUMMARY: Google Flights examined five years of historical flight data to reveal the strategies that save money on airfare.

TITLE: Warren Buffett's portrait, complete with his autograph, just sold for over $75,000 at a charity auction
SUMMARY: Billionaire Warren Buffett's autographed portrait from art tech company Motiva was auctioned off on eBay this week, with proceeds going to nonprofit Girls Inc.

TITLE: Despite recession fears, most 401(k) investors haven’t changed their portfolios. Here’s what advisors suggest
SUMMARY: Despite recession worries, only 5% of 401(k) and 403(b) investors shifted their asset allocations during the second quarter of 2022. Here's what to know.

TITLE: Who wants to be a billionaire? 6 in 10 Americans strive to be mega-wealthy, report finds
SUMMARY: Six in 10 adults want to become a billionaire one day, according to a recent report. But as the wealth gap widens, there's also resentment toward the mega-rich.

TITLE: Kevin O'Leary on his worst 'Shark Tank' investment ever: ‘I lost half a million dollars'
SUMMARY: Kevin O'Leary, a star investor on ABC's "Shark Tank," says he learned to always trust his gut after sinking $500,000 into a telecom startup that "went to zero."

TITLE: Education Department cancels $1.5 billion in student debt for 79,000 borrowers subjected to ‘false promises’ by Westwood College
SUMMARY: The U.S. Department of Education announced on Tuesday that it will cancel the student loans for 79,000 borrowers who attended Westwood College.

TITLE: Inflation drives long-term care costs even higher. Here’s how planning ahead can help families afford it
SUMMARY: High inflation will likely make the rising costs more difficult for many families to afford already expensive long-term care for ailing or elderly relatives.

TITLE: Op-ed: September is historically the worst month of the year for stocks, but recent strength suggests the market could buck the trend
SUMMARY: It's reasonable to expect a better-than-usual September, typically the worst month for stocks. Much of the annual de-risking took place earlier in the year.

TITLE: Three people with travel 'dream jobs' explain how they scored them
SUMMARY: Three people with high-profile jobs in the travel industry share the humbling experiences that kickstarted their careers.

TITLE: Do you make too much for student loan forgiveness? Here's how to figure out whether you qualify
SUMMARY: There are income limits for President Joe Biden's student loan forgiveness plan. Here's how to figure out if your earnings qualify.

TITLE: These 13 states may hit borrowers with up to $1,100 in state tax liability on forgiven student loans. How to know if your debt cancellation will trigger a bill
SUMMARY: While Biden's student loan forgiveness plan is tax-free on federal returns, it may trigger liability at the state level. Here's what borrowers need to know.

TITLE: Randi Zuckerberg says she's a 'big proponent of the real world' when it comes to parenting
SUMMARY: The creator or Facebook Live says she's a "big proponent of the real world" — especially when it comes to protecting children from technology.

TITLE: Which website has the cheapest hotel rates? A new study compared prices to find out
SUMMARY: A new study suggests hotel rates vary more in places like New York and Honolulu than they do in Hong Kong, Bangkok or Istanbul.

TITLE: IRS to refund a 'very welcome' $1.2 billion in late-filing fees for nearly 1.6 million taxpayers
SUMMARY: The IRS will waive penalties for many Americans who late-filed tax returns during the pandemic. Here's how to know if you qualify.

TITLE: Tired of paying more for less, shoppers take to TikTok to call out companies for 'shrinkflation’
SUMMARY: Companies are reducing the contents of their packaging. How has 'shrinkflation' impacted young folks and are there ways to overcome it? CNBC Make It finds out.

TITLE: Unlimited caviar and private space: Airlines are playing catch-up by wooing luxury travelers
SUMMARY: Emirates airline announced a more than $2 billion investment to improve its inflight customer experience, with perks such as unlimited caviar.

TITLE: Bill Gates: Dr. Fauci is 'a hero to millions of people, including me'
SUMMARY: Billionaire Bill Gates, a longtime collaborator with Dr. Anthony Fauci, praised the 81-year-old immunologist and public servant following his latest career news.

TITLE: 'We don't see any slowdown' from superrich car buyers, says Bugatti Rimac CEO
SUMMARY: Bugatti Rimac CEO Mate Rimac said the maker of a new sold-out supercar isn't seeing any signs of a slowdown among its wealthy buyers.

TITLE: Here's how you can save $1 million for retirement on an annual salary of $70,000
SUMMARY: You need to invest 9% of your $70,000 salary to retire with $1 million if you start saving in your 20s. If you start later in life, you'll have to save more.

TITLE: Indian spiritual guru, followed by Will Smith and Tom Brady, says it's life rather than lifestyle that really matters
SUMMARY: Sadhguru, the yoga master turned social media celebrity with over 8.6 million Instagram followers, says his philosophy is to always feel "blissed out."

TITLE: Dr. Fauci's influence reaches beyond Covid, across five decades of research: 'He always spoke to science, committed to what was right'
SUMMARY: Dr. Anthony Fauci is stepping down from the federal government. His influence stretches across decades, from fighting the HIV/AIDS crisis to the Covid pandemic.

TITLE: 88% of investors worry about inflation, rate hikes. Here's how to prepare your portfolio as interest rates continue to rise
SUMMARY: After nearly eight months of market volatility, many investors still worry about rising interest rates and how they affect their portfolio. Here's what to know.

TITLE: This 30-year-old makes $114,000 a month in passive income: ‘4 businesses you can start today for $99 or less'
SUMMARY: Charlie Chang started several of his passive income streams — which now gross an average of $114,000 per month — with $0 down. He shares four passive income businesses you can start for "less than $100."

TITLE: A sunken city and an Instagrammer's dream: Dubai's new water attractions tap into revenge tourism trend
SUMMARY: Blatant one-upmanship and theatrical displays are part of the city's DNA — and in an era of depressing international news, who can blame holidaymakers for wanting some out-of-this-world escapism?

TITLE: $14.9M palatial estate in Connecticut priced to break local record
SUMMARY: The brick-and-limestone residence, built in 1929, is the most expensive home for sale in New Canaan with a $14.9 million price tag.

TITLE: Single-stock ETFs are 'way too risky for 99% of investors,' advisor says. What to know before adding one to your portfolio
SUMMARY: If you're chasing quick returns, single-stock exchange-traded funds allow leveraged bets on individual assets. Here's what to know before buying.

TITLE: Classic car auctions in Monterey score a record $469 million
SUMMARY: Over 790 cars sold for a sales total of $469 million at the auctions in Monterey this weekend.
